title: Marc Ducret Trio + 3 2015 Metatonal
description: Marc Ducret Trio+3 ~ Métatonal ~ 2015 Ayler Records AYLCD-148. http://i1.imageban.ru/out/2017/06/17/2f3b790b69f1469532b8bd5d46c3acda.jpg 1 Dialectes 14:56 2 Inflammable 8:56 3 64 (Including The Times They Are A-Changin' And Wigwam) 11:46 4 Kumiho 12:51 5 Porteurs De Lanternes 9:43 Bruno Chevillon: double bass Eric Echampard: drums Marc Ducret: electric guitar Christophe Monniot: saxophones Samuel Blaser: trombone Fabrice Martinez: trumpet This is a highly original album that does not return to well-worn formats when seeking structural unity, but instead finds a good musical balance between grounded form and more inspirational moments. The recordings are excellent and the balance between the instruments is that of studio quality with the vibrancy of a live recording. This is a fantastic album from the guitarist, which clearly contains his vision as well as his excellent playing. - Chris Haines, freejazzblog.org
